scripts.meadow:pack-local-packages: npm run --prefix ./crates/schema/schema generate && rm -rf ./.npm-local && mkdir -p ./.npm-local ./.npm-cache && npm_config_cache=${PWD}/.npm-cache npm pack ./crates/schema/schema --silent --pack-destination ./.npm-local && npm_config_cache=${PWD}/.npm-cache npm pack ./clients/web-sdk --silent --pack-destination ./.npm-local
scripts.meadow:install-local-packages: npm run meadow:pack-local-packages && npm_config_cache=${PWD}/.npm-cache npm install --prefix ${MEADOW_PATH:-./clients/meadow} --no-save ./.npm-local/moor-schema-*.tgz ./.npm-local/moor-web-sdk-*.tgz
scripts.daemon:dev: RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo run -p moor-daemon -- ./moor-data --db development.db --import-format objdef --import ${MOOR_CORE:-cores/cowbell/src} --export development-export --export-format objdef --use-boolean-returns true --custom-errors true --use-uuobjids true --enable-eventlog true --generate-keypair --anonymous-objects true
scripts.daemon:traced: RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo run --features trace_events -p moor-daemon -- ./moor-data --db development.db --import-format objdef --import ${MOOR_CORE:-cores/cowbell/src} --export development-export --export-format objdef --use-boolean-returns true --custom-errors true --use-uuobjids true --enable-eventlog true --trace-output moor-trace.json  --anonymous-objects true
scripts.full:dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix ${MEADOW_PATH:-./clients/meadow}" "npm run daemon:dev" "npm run web-host:dev"
scripts.full:dev:oauth2: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix ${MEADOW_PATH:-./clients/meadow}" "npm run daemon:dev" "npm run web-host:dev:oauth2"
scripts.full:dev-traced: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix ${MEADOW_PATH:-./clients/meadow}" "npm run daemon:traced" "npm run web-host:dev"
scripts.full:build: cd ${MEADOW_PATH:-./clients/meadow} && npm run build && cd - && npm run web-host:build
